attributes.action: Change the way the new Child maintenance options works. Make absent parents pay
attributes.background: Single parents are ending up worse off due to the new child maintenance options service. Some parents are receiving nothing whilst others have had their child's maintenance dropped. If a parent is absent from a child's life they should be made to pay more as not contributing to day to day living.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you'd like the child maintenance options service to be changed.
